comment.author: 61180102@N05
comment._content: I love looking at these, what did they do in everyday life, did they have kids, what was there favourite drink/meal I just sit and wonder..

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: For 20 of the identified soldiers, Anne Tyler Moses did some research to fill out their biographies. Her "Glimpses of Soldiers' lives" is online at www.loc.gov/rr/print/coll/Soldiersbiosintro.html. One of my favorites is Cornelius Moore of New York who included sketches in his letters home, www.loc.gov/rr/print/coll/SoldierbiosMooreC.html .
